description: This header declares the GridWidget class, which is a QWidget-derived component responsible for rendering a 4x4 grid of tiles for a game like 2048. It manages the visual representation and layout of tiles, including setting the game board state and handling resize and paint events.

classes.name: GridWidget
classes.description: A QWidget-derived class that displays a 4x4 grid for the game 2048, arranging TileWidgets and handling rendering, layout, and animations.

methods.name: GridWidget
methods.description: Constructor initializing the widget with an optional parent.

methods.name: setBoard
methods.description: Set the current game board state with a 2D QVector of integers, optionally animating the transition.

methods.name: resizeEvent
methods.description: Handles the widget resize event to adjust layout accordingly.

methods.name: paintEvent
methods.description: Handles the paint event to render the widget visually.

methods.name: tileRect
methods.description: Calculates the rectangle area for a tile at a given row and column.

methods.name: layoutTiles
methods.description: Arranges the tile widgets within the grid, optionally with animation.

methods.name: ensureTiles
methods.description: Ensures the tile widgets are created and ready for layout.
